message: Let's split it 50/50 and be done with it!
I'll give you 400k, but you have to give me 600k. It's a fair deal!
I'll give you a better deal, but you'll have to take less. You can't have it all!
I'll give you 450k, but I want 550k. You're getting a good deal, don't pass it up!
I'll give you the majority, but I'm not going to get taken for a ride. You're getting a good deal, but I'm not getting a bad one either.
